mapper.insert: INSERT INTO diary(diarydate, history, photoid, email, foodname) VALUES(sysdate(), #{history}, #{photoid}, #{email}, #{foodname})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM diary d INNER JOIN photos p ON d.PHOTOID = p.PHOTOID INNER JOIN foodinfo f ON d.FOODNAME = f.FOODNAME WHERE email = #{email} ORDER BY d.datano DESC
